ItemDescription.Description: This starting item for Magical users restores Mana and gives the owner bonus Damage on damaging Abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Gain 1 stack every time you hit an enemy with a basic attack. If you have 5 stacks, the next time you deal damage with an ability the stacks are consumed and you gain 40 mana, and that ability and any abilities used in the next 3s will deal bonus damage equal to having +40 Magical Power for those abilities.

ShortDesc: Collect souls to deal extra damage.
